title: Bedroom
text: [p]You are standing in your bedroom. Here, are, some, commas. It is [i]tidy[/i].[/p][p]You are ready for anything.[/p]

title: Kitchen
text: Your kitchen smells like lavender and [color=maroon]blood[/color].

title: Beautiful Day
text: You look out the window. It seems like it's nice outside.
